survey_metadata.title: ☕ Coffee Shop Customer Satisfaction Survey
survey_metadata.description: We value your time with us! Your feedback helps us improve our coffee, service, and overall shop experience so we can serve you better.
survey_metadata.target_audience: Coffee shop customers (regulars and first-time visitors)
survey_metadata.purpose: Evaluate overall customer satisfaction with coffee, service, ambiance, and pricing to identify strengths and improvement areas.

questions.title: How satisfied are you with the quality of our coffee and menu items?
How would you rate our staff’s friendliness and service?
How would you describe the ambiance of our coffee shop (cleanliness, comfort, music, atmosphere)?
Do you feel our menu offers good value for money?
How likely are you to return or recommend our coffee shop to others?
What’s one thing we can improve to make your next visit better?

responses.q1756866250956: Everything is great, none so far
Service could be a bit faster
